artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Published by Mitaya Kihachi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill Jr.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: This picture is after an illustration in vol. 住吉郡1 of Pictures of Famous Places in Settsu (Settsu meisho zue) from 1796.
title: Giant Pine of Naniwaya in Anryū-machi
